.. _getting_started:

Getting Started
===============

To get starting, connect to an lxplus machine or a computecanada node with condor or slurm installed. 

Installation
------------

.. code-block:: console

    $ pip install https://github.com/luadamek/pybatchsub

Replace ``https://github.com/luadamek/pybatchsub`` with ``git@github.com:luadamek/pybatchsub`` if you have GitHub ``ssh`` keys set up.
